com.epoch
Class Topic

java.lang.Object
  com.epoch.Topic
All Implemented Interfaces:
TopicQSetConstants
public class Topic
extends Object
implements TopicQSetConstants

Holds topic information while viewing/editing/adding topic. Topics contain question sets, which contain questions. Scope: loaded by DB layer, used by UI layer (view/edit); created by UI layer, written by DB layer (add). Sessions: QuestionBank.

Field Summary
 int id
          Unique ID number.
 String instructorId
          Login (UK) or SMS (Pearson) ID of the instructor authoring.
 String name
          Name of the topic, such as "Alkenes".
 List<QSetDescr> qSets
          Descriptions of the question sets in this topic.
 String remarks
          Miscellaneous remarks about the topic.
